title: Tiny's Hope
description: TinyFrom the moment I met Chains, my life has changed drastically. I’ve gone from being shy around all the men to coming out of my shell, making friends.Chains was everything I ever hoped for and I couldn’t ask for more. Not even when we started a family. Our life in my eyes, couldn’t be more perfect.Now it’s all at risk, as my nightmares become our life.I only hope we make it through the terrors coming our way from every direction. I nearly lost Chains once, I don’t want to feel the fear of losing him again. Right now, I can only hope we survive it all together without either of us getting hurt.
author: E.C. Land
